Properties.Description: How to search for the entities using the targetname.

The Sight Entity (if you provide one) is an entity that will leave the current ActBusy if the Actor playing the ActBusy loses sight of it for the amount of time specified in 'Sight Entity Timeout'. THIS MAY ONLY BE A TARGET NAME. NO CLASSNAMES.
If you provide a Sight Entity, the Actor will leave the current ActBusy if the Actor has lost sight of Sight Entity for this many seconds.

If set, Actors won't search for act busy opportunities, even when the act busy goal is enabled. Instead, they'll require the NPC AI code to trigger act busies opportunistically (i.e. like zombies with unreachable enemies do).
The method to use to determine whether the Sight enemy is visible.

Options.Name: Forced and held until deactivated via input

Properties.Description: Only for combat actbusy. Lets you specify a volume which is the 'safe zone'. The Combat ActBusy will cancel if any enemies are seen in the safe zone.

InputOutputs.Name: Activate
InputOutputs.Description: Begin acting busy

InputOutputs.Name: Deactivate
InputOutputs.Description: Cease acting busy

InputOutputs.Name: SetBusySearchRange
InputOutputs.Description: Update the busy search range for all actors.

InputOutputs.Name: ForceNPCToActBusy
InputOutputs.Description: Force an NPC to act busy. Takes parameters, separated by spaces: <Targetname> <hint node targetname> <optional:teleport> <optional:$customactivityorsequence> <maximum time to actbusy>. If no hint node targetname is specified, it'll search for a random one. If no max time is specified, it'll use the default. Specifying 0 as the max time will make the NPC act busy until disturbed. If the optional teleport parameter is specified, the NPC will teleport to the act busy point. A custom move animation can be specified by prepending $ to the name of it. i.e. $ACT_RUN will make the NPC Run. Sequence names can be used instead of activities.

InputOutputs.Name: ForceThisNPCToActBusy
InputOutputs.Description: Force an NPC outputted from another entity to act busy. (only usable from an output that specifies an entity)

InputOutputs.Name: ForceThisNPCToLeave
InputOutputs.Description: Force an NPC outputted from another entity to find a HINT_NPC_EXIT_POINT hintnode and vanish.

InputOutputs.Name: OnNPCStartedBusy
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when an NPC targeted by this goal starts an ActBusy animation.

InputOutputs.Name: OnNPCFinishedBusy
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when an NPC targeted by this goal finishes an ActBusy.

InputOutputs.Name: OnNPCLeft
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when an NPC target by this goal finishes a forced Leave.

InputOutputs.Name: SetType
InputOutputs.Description: Change the Actbusy Type to the specified value. See 'Actbusy Type' for valid values.

InputOutputs.Name: EnableSearch
InputOutputs.Description: Turn on active searching.

InputOutputs.Name: DisableSearch
InputOutputs.Description: Turn off active searching.

InputOutputs.Name: OnNPCLostSeeEntity
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when the NPC loses sight of the see entity (if one is specified).

InputOutputs.Name: OnNPCSeeEnemy
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when this NPC leaves his actbusy because of sighting an enemy.
